whatWeBuild.title: What We're Building
whatWeBuild.subtitle: Open Badges Platform for Neurodivergent Creators
whatWeBuild.description: We're creating a comprehensive Open Badges ecosystem that celebrates diverse achievements and learning paths. Our platform recognizes that success isn't one-size-fits-all.

trackProgress.title: Track and Showcase Progress
trackProgress.description: Track progress on any goal that matters to you ‚Äì learning, work, hobbies, community action, personal growth, and more. Our flexible system adapts to your unique journey, letting you document and celebrate achievements in a way that makes sense for you.

visualizeJourney.title: Visualize Your Journey
visualizeJourney.description: See your progress and achievements in meaningful, visual ways. Our platform offers different views and representations of your journey, helping you recognize patterns, celebrate milestones, and stay motivated through visual feedback.

pauseRestart.title: Pause and Restart with Ease
pauseRestart.description: Life isn't linear, and neither is progress. Our system supports natural ebbs and flows, letting you pause during challenging times like burnout or low motivation. When you're ready to return, you'll find your progress preserved and tools to help you pick up where you left off.

connectCommunity.title: Connect with Community
connectCommunity.description: Join a community that understands. Share experiences, learn from others' journeys, and find mutual support. Our platform facilitates meaningful connections through shared achievements and collaborative learning paths.

buildCommunity.title: Build Community
buildCommunity.description: Connect with other neurodivergent creators, share your journey, and discover new opportunities. Our platform is designed to foster genuine connections and collaborative growth.

shareJourney.title: Share Your Journey
shareJourney.description: Tell your story in a way that resonates with you. Our platform supports various formats and styles, letting you document and share your progress authentically.

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.content: Rigid schedules and linear lists don't always align with how our minds work best. We understand that neurodivergent strengths are different, and navigating goals requires tools that offer flexibility, clear steps, and genuine understanding ‚Äì not just another calendar.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.content: At Rollercoaster.dev, our vision is simple: Create the tools we wish existed, built by and for the neurodivergent community.
